title: Decision Scope Details
description: Decision scope details capture properties that existed to narrow the scope of the decision to a location (the "Where"), a the business activity (the "How") and the provider of the decision ("By Whom"). The location is expressed with the concept of a Placement.

xdm:id.title: Decision Scope Identifier
xdm:id.description: The unique identifier of the decision scope. For a given decision request a scope narrows the decision process along multiple dimensions. The scope is referencable by its identifier.

xdm:decisionProvider.title: Decision Provider
xdm:decisionProvider.description: The provider that was asked to make the decision. This dimension is used when mutliple services can make decisions for the same placement or activity.

xdm:placement.title: Placement Detail for the Scope
xdm:placement.description: The placement that was a requested as part of this decision scope. A scope will include a specification of the location or surface where the option will be presented. The placement narrows the options that can be proposed to those that can be represented or rendered in that place.

xdm:activity.title: Activity Detail for the Scope
xdm:activity.description: The activity that was a requested or chosen for this decision scope. Some scopes will prescribe the exact activity or mechanism (how) that makes the decision, other .
